summary: HeroSection was updated to reference the new cartoony hero image filename and retains the existing fallback-on-error behavior. However, the actual new static asset file was not added in the diff summary. There are also unrelated modifications to metadata/summary files not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new more cartoony cute hero image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filename `cute-hero-photo-cartoony.dim_1600x2000.jpg`, accessible via `/assets/generated/...` without relying on the backend.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, and there is no evidence that `frontend/public/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo-cartoony.dim_1600x2000.jpg` was added to the repository. Without the static asset, the browser would 404 and the component would fall back to the placeholder.
evidence: File diff summary: ADDED FILES: none

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state (project_state.json) unrelated to replacing the hero image asset/path.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add a new static hero image and update HeroSection to use it; it did not request updating project state tracking files.
BuildRequest did not request changing documentation/summary files; only the hero image asset and HeroSection reference.
